args.name: fsky
args.comment: Fraction of the sky to be observed. We consider galactic polar caps patches and assume the latest Planck polarized foregrounds maps.

args.name: uKCMBarcmin
args.comment: Sensitivity, in uK_CMB.arcmin, for each frequency channel

args.name: FWHM
args.comment: FWHM in arcmin for each frequency channel

args.name: ell_max
args.comment: Maximum multipole to be considered in the analysis

args.name: ell_min
args.comment: Minimum multipole to be considered in the analysis

args.name: Bd
args.comment: Dust spectral index, assuming a grey body spectral emission

args.name: Td
args.comment: Dust temperature, assuming a grey body spectral emission

args.name: Bs
args.comment: Synchrotron spectral index, assuming a power law spectral emission

args.name: components_v
args.comment: Pick the assumed sky components (there is always CMB by default)

args.name: params_dev_v
args.comment: Pick the cosmological parameters to be estimated (the code will give you marginalized errors)

args.name: informations_channels_v
args.comment: Pick the relevant observables of your survey
